name: china_osm_v301_commitments_industry
title: Monetary value of Chinese ODA and OOF-financed industry projects (GeoGCDF v3.0.1)
description: Monetary commitment value of Chinese ODA- and OOF-financed projects from AidData's Geospatial Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset v3.0.1. These constant 2021 USD values are associated with industry sector projects from the dataset for which locations were found using OpenStreetMap (OSM).

extract_types_info.sum: total commitment value (2021 USD) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Goodman, S., Zhang, S., Malik, A.A., Parks, B.C., Hall, J. 2024. AidData's Geospatial Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset. Scientific Data. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-03341-w
